author: William Worrall
title: Cannibal Holocaust Game Is a Truly Terrible Idea Right Now
description: A game that follows up on the 1980's 'video nasty' Cannibal Holocaust is coming out soon, and it's not going to end well. The post Cannibal Holocaust Game Is a Truly Terrible Idea Right Now appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Cannibal Holocaust has been called one of the most controversial films of all time.
  • A new game is being planned which will continue the legacy of that film.
  • This idea is only going to end in disaster.
2020 has been a rough yea… [+2994 chars]
